name: gCaptain
notes: Fast incident news; frequent vessel and port mentions (official RSS)

name: Splash247
notes: Commercial shipping incidents; frequent vessel/port mentions

name: MarineLink
notes: Technical shipping and incident news; includes IMO numbers

name: Hellenic Shipping News
notes: General maritime coverage; good supplementary signal

name: Marine Insight
notes: Marine safety and operational incidents; some IMO mentions

name: Seatrade Maritime
notes: Covers global commercial and incident reports

name: Insurance Marine News
notes: Insurance-focused incidents; frequently includes IMO and vessel details

name: Marine Log
notes: Operations, casualties, port disruptions; clean RSS

name: FleetMon Maritime News
notes: Frequent incident posts; IMO often present in body

name: The Maritime Executive
notes: Scrape latest stories; RSS endpoint unreliable/malformed

name: USCG MSIB (NAVCEN Index)
notes: Index of sector/district RSS; use to discover more regional feeds

name: USCG MSIB District 5
notes: US Mid-Atlantic / Chesapeake Bay region (RSS can be finicky; fetch-then-parse)

name: ReCAAP Alerts/Reports
notes: Official piracy & armed robbery reports; crawl alerts + monthly PDFs

name: IMO GISIS (MCI)
notes: IMO casualties/incidents for verification and history (vessel+IMO)

name: EMSA Annual Overview
notes: EU annual casualty/incident summary; authoritative but not real-time

name: MarineTraffic News
notes: No RSS; use page scrape or MarineTraffic API for AIS/event tags if licensed

name: SAFETY4SEA (Accident Reports)
notes: Accident/casualty posts; RSS unreliable

name: FleetMon Maritime News
notes: HTML fallback if RSS fails (SSL/CA)

name: UKMTO Recent Incidents
notes: Official piracy/armed robbery incidents (Indian Ocean/APAC)

name: Maritime Bulletin (Accidents)
notes: Accident reports; category pages

name: NATO Shipping Centre Advisories
notes: SharePoint/JS heavy; treat as portal unless you add a JS renderer

name: USCG MSIB (NAVCEN Index)
notes: Discover sector/district RSS endpoints

name: ReCAAP Alerts/Reports
notes: Official alerts + monthly PDFs

name: MarineTraffic News
notes: JS-heavy; use API if licensed

name: EMSA Annual Overview
notes: Single publication page; not a feed/list

name: TradeWinds
notes: Fully enabled portal ingestion; TradeWinds uses JS + paywall but pipeline should still attempt access and extract visible headlines/snippets

name: TradeWinds
notes: HTML scrape of homepage: extract latest headlines/links; many articles require login but titles still useful for incident discovery

name: Insurance Business (Marine)
notes: Scrape marine incident and insurance loss articles; clean HTML structure; reliable for port/vessel extraction
